    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
                    java.lang.String nickname)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Establish a connection to a MicroTrader server. This method should be the first one called by the client as no other operation (expect for ClientComm.isConnected()) can be performed before a connection to the server has been established.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ClientComm
        Parameters:
        host - Address of the server. For instance "localhost", "192.168.1.1", and or similar.
        nickname - The nickname of the user.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if a connection cannot be established.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Check if currently connected to a host.
        Specified by:
        isConnected in interface ClientComm
        Returns:
        true if currently connected to a host, false otherwise.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Disconnects from the server. Any sockets should be closed immediately. Pending orders are not guaranteed to be delivered before disconnecting.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface ClientComm

      • getNextMessage

        public ClientSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Get the next message received from the server. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message has been received. If no message will ever be received, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getNextMessage in interface ClientComm
        Returns:
        The next message sent by the server to the client or null if no message will ever be received (disconnected from server).

      • hasNextMessage

        public boolean hasNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Checks if a message from the server is pending. If ClientComm.hasNextMessage() returns true, a call to ClientComm.getNextMessage() will return immediately with the oldest message in the queue. If ClientComm.hasNextMessage() returns false, a call to ClientComm.getNextMessage() will block until a message has been received.
        Specified by:
        hasNextMessage in interface ClientComm
        Returns:
        true if a message from the server is currently pending, otherwise false.

      • sendOrder

        public void sendOrder(Order order)
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Send an order to the server which should then process the order.
        Specified by:
        sendOrder in interface ClientComm
        Parameters:
        order - The MicroTrader order to send.
